messages.title: If you vote Conservative on Thursday...
messages.content: You will make one very happy man...

messages.title: It's a two horse race
messages.content: between the Lib Dems or Labour in Brent.

messages.title: Real change for us in Brent
messages.content: The Lib Dems have a plan that will give ordinary people a fair chance to get on in life.

endorsements.endorsement: Vince Cable says: Learn how Lib Dems can help change Britain!

images.caption: Nick Clegg says: Only a vote for Sarah Teather can defeat and change Britain!
Voting Conservative here in Brent could make Brown PM again
It's a two horse race between the Lib Dems or Labour in Brent.
Rallying call - Sarah with supporters in Brent.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is urging tactical voting by suggesting a vote for the Conservatives is effectively a vote for Gordon Brown, thus presenting the election as a two-horse race between the Liberal Democrats and the Labour Party. The leaflet features endorsements and messages aimed at swaying voters toward the Liberal Democrats to prevent a Labour victory.
